languages.text: Ребра ласераксов ходят ходуном, с длинных языков стекает тягучая слюна. Должно быть, им смертельно хочется пить в этот жаркий вечер.
The laceraxes' ribs are heaving, thick saliva dripping from their long tongues. The creatures must be terribly thirsty on this hot evening.
languages.original_text: Ребра ласераксов ходят ходуном, с длинных языков стекает тягучая слюна. Должно быть, им смертельно хочется пить в этот жаркий вечер.

traits.locale_text: The laceraxes' ribs are heaving, thick saliva dripping from their long tongues. The creatures must be terribly thirsty on this hot evening.

languages.text: ラセラックスのあばらが大きく上下し、長い舌からねばつくよだれがしたたっている。この暑い夜に、生き物たちは酷く喉が渇いているに違いない。
languages.original_text: The laceraxes' ribs are heaving, thick saliva dripping from their long tongues. The creatures must be terribly thirsty on this hot evening.

traits.locale_text: ラセラックスのあばらが大きく上下し、長い舌からねばつくよだれがしたたっている。この暑い夜に、生き物たちは酷く喉が渇いているに違いない。

languages.text: Die Rippen der Laceraxe heben und senken sich, von ihren langen Zungen tropft dicke Spucke. Die Kreaturen müssen an diesem heißen Abend schrecklich durstig sein.
languages.original_text: The laceraxes' ribs are heaving, thick saliva dripping from their long tongues. The creatures must be terribly thirsty on this hot evening.

traits.locale_text: Die Rippen der Laceraxe heben und senken sich, von ihren langen Zungen tropft dicke Spucke. Die Kreaturen müssen an diesem heißen Abend schrecklich durstig sein.

languages.text: Los lacerax están jadeando y una espesa saliva gotea de sus largas lenguas. Con el calor que hace, estas bestias deben de tener sed.
languages.original_text: The laceraxes' ribs are heaving, thick saliva dripping from their long tongues. The creatures must be terribly thirsty on this hot evening.

traits.locale_text: Los lacerax están jadeando y una espesa saliva gotea de sus largas lenguas. Con el calor que hace, estas bestias deben de tener sed.

languages.text: 这群异虎肋骨不断起伏，粘稠的唾液从它们长长的舌头上滴落。这里的晚上这么炎热，它们恐怕已经渴坏了。
languages.original_text: The laceraxes' ribs are heaving, thick saliva dripping from their long tongues. The creatures must be terribly thirsty on this hot evening.

traits.locale_text: 这群异虎肋骨不断起伏，粘稠的唾液从它们长长的舌头上滴落。这里的晚上这么炎热，它们恐怕已经渴坏了。

languages.text: Laseraksların kaburgaları inip kalkıyor, uzun dillerindense salyalar damlıyor. Bu sıcak akşamda berbat derecede susamış olmalılar.
languages.original_text: The laceraxes' ribs are heaving, thick saliva dripping from their long tongues. The creatures must be terribly thirsty on this hot evening.

traits.locale_text: Laseraksların kaburgaları inip kalkıyor, uzun dillerindense salyalar damlıyor. Bu sıcak akşamda berbat derecede susamış olmalılar.

languages.text: Les flancs des lacérax se soulèvent péniblement, tandis qu'une épaisse salive dégouline de leurs langues. Ces créatures doivent être terriblement assoiffées en cette soirée étouffante.
languages.original_text: The laceraxes' ribs are heaving, thick saliva dripping from their long tongues. The creatures must be terribly thirsty on this hot evening.

traits.locale_text: Les flancs des lacérax se soulèvent péniblement, tandis qu'une épaisse salive dégouline de leurs langues. Ces créatures doivent être terriblement assoiffées en cette soirée étouffante.
